trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBFST029_00172_SEQ_00<tab>Arold needs an adventurer to supply him with a hi<var 1F /var>potion.

TEXT_SUBFST029_00172_SEQ_01<tab>Arold, a Wood Wailer stationed at Gilbert's Spire, was mercilessly mauled by a scurry of squirrels and is in a bad way. Unfortunately, he's run out of hi-potions and cannot leave his post to obtain more from the merchant at the Bannock. Help Arold by bringing him the medication he needs.
TEXT_SUBFST029_00172_SEQ_02<tab>Thanks to your kindness, Arold should make a swift recovery. Though his wounds will heal, he vows to remain vigilant, lest the Twelveswood punish his unwariness again.

TEXT_SUBFST029_00172_AROLD_000_1<tab>Oh gods, the pain... I caught a scurry of squirrels gnawing on the fences earlier. I managed to drive them off, but not before they decided to gnaw on <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var> instead! And now I'm the bloody mess you see before you.

TEXT_SUBFST029_00172_AROLD_000_2<tab>To make matters worse, I find myself without so much as a single hi-potion. I know, I know...foolhardy. I vaguely recall using my last one after some trifling scrape several moons past... The gods alone know why I didn't think to replace it there and then. You wouldn't happen to be carrying a spare flask?

TEXT_SUBFST029_00172_AROLD_000_3<tab>If you don't have any on hand, the merchant at the Bannock should have some in her stock. I can't leave my post, so if you could bring me a hi-potion, I'd be tremendously grateful.
TEXT_SUBFST029_00172_AROLD_000_10<tab>Seven hells, did those accursed squirrels leave any part of me untouched? Ah, you're back! Do you have that hi-potion for me?
TEXT_SUBFST029_00172_AROLD_000_11<tab>Thank the gods! I owe you one, my friend. Here, I want you to have this.

TEXT_SUBFST029_00172_AROLD_000_12<tab>I had no idea squirrels could bite so <var 1A 02 /var>hard<var 1A 01 /var>! I thought I had seen everything, but it seems there are still surprises to be found in the Twelveswood. We both would do well to remember that.
